name: Age of age
description:
A simple turn based arena prototype.

Choose up to ten units type to fight in the arena for you, set them up on the battlefield, defeat your opponent.

This early build include a faction editor with choice for banner, unit color and name. Only one unit type is currently implemented making for a quite dull gameplay experience but the game is entirely functionnal.

Armies are stored on the disk as json files so they can easily be transfered, exchanged or modified.

This is not much by itself but it served as a framework for every single one of my later grid based strategy project.
